title: 6. Chloe Valdary and Karen Wong:  Limitation is Necessary for Creativity
description:
Chloe and Karen discuss art and music, and the role of constraints and limits in jumpstarting the creative process.

The longer conversation (including Chloe's life story, the genesis of The Theory of Enchantment, and the intersection of her theory with Jordan Peterson's ideas of hierarchies and archetypes) is here:  https://youtu.be/ph8fi1iytws
